name: BONE appetit (itch)
description:
This is a jam submission to Gamedev.js jam 2022!
A funny idea, where the main character is climbing from one balcony to another while being hit by slippers.

- CONTROLS -

(A, D)  or (Left, Right) -> to move
(Space) -> to jump
use the mouse to aim, and LMB or RMB to shoot

- OBJECTIVE -

Get the highest score!

Collect RAW BRAINS to increase the score,
but the game gets harder the more you score.

[the force of the slippers increases with the score, making it harder to push through].

- Team discord IDs -
SpaceMarco#8068
MAThMaTiCs#3285


Note: Try dying for the lols.
